Name: Emission VR
About the game: The study and the creation of biological weapons in a secret lab made virus that turns people into the walking dead. Once the virus got into the ventilation system and the state had to preserve the lab. Ten years have passed and the protagonist charge to enter the lab and destroy all proof-virus. This survival horror game where you have to confront the zombies in the narrow corridors.
